input.sentences: [male] and [male] started working on their presentation last week .
they were very happy with the way it tuned out .
and | then it was time to prepare . they started with a beautiful tv display .
and | [male] was prepared to film everything from afar .
[male] took the stage | with his partner [male] | and they were a hit with everyone .
output.sentences: Mr. Boss is trying to orchestrate a presentation at a meeting.
The theme is being positive in the workplace, but something strange has started to happen.
The words keep replicating and growing, taking over the screen!
Mr. Boss can't get it to stop, it's a virus of happy thoughts!
Finally, they all just give in to the creeping, smothering, happy thoughts.
